pr_title: EBP: Use MUI icon and fix alignment for date modified filter and close icon

timeline.message: Realign the calendar icon to the right hand side of the input field
Add two new icons for the date picker and close icon
Replace the calendar and close icons with the new images

timeline.bodyText:
images will always need left padding equal to their size? 🤨
Wouldn't the sizing be covered by width: $width?
timeline.author: ChristianMurphy

replies.bodyText:
This is a CSS hack to facilitate the replacing of images in existing image tags. So you need the padding to first push the current image out enough to then allow the new one to fit in.
This will only be used sparingly, and is only until New UI is complete.
